page.title: 08LOTHERSDALE SOCIAL CLUB
page.content:
{The Social Club}was re-started approximately 5 years ago by a small group of villagers.A village meeting was held and through the enthusiasm of those attending,money was raised,the 'Clubhouse' was redecorated and heating installed.
The membership has averaged 100 out of 300 in the village and its environs Family membership is Â£12,individual adults Â£5 and juniors Â£3.
Regular activities include snooker, whist drives,Youth club,over 60's club the Choir and badminton.Occasionally there are dances,the Summer Fayre,a Strawberry Tea and caving and climbing weekends.
